ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Scales from other places....
ygData.msgSnippet: Nortlav the Scalekeeper is the same as VS in Kanors Castle. Just go all out nuke and damage discipline and he dies in 15 seconds tops. You don t want to let
ygData.messageBody:
Nortlav the Scalekeeper is the same as VS in Kanors Castle. Just go all out
nuke and damage discipline and he dies in 15 seconds tops. You don't want to
let him get off too many of those life taps procs on you. He also only drops
the red scale.

Sistily
60 Gnome Warrior


-----Original Message-----
From: Henrik Holm [SMTP:HEH@...]
Sent: Friday, February 15, 2002 8:00 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Scales from other places....

I think (not from my own knowleadge mark you) that Nortlav the
Scalekeeper
is comparable to a dragon in difficualty and I dont think he drops
anything
but the red scale?

Musiker

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
<mailto:[mailto:snicker@...]>
> Sent: 14. februar 2002 20:33
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com <mailto:eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
> Subject: [eqbards] Scales from other places.... (was RE: twisting
5,
> added note)
>
>
> At 11:24 AM 2/14/2002 -0800, you wrote:
>
> >P.S. This is the most activity I've seen on this list in
> months. Good topic.
>
> well, since you liked that one so much, here's another topic.
> Someone on
> the "other" EQ-Bards list mentioned that you could circumvent
> dragon-slaying by hunting a specific mob in The Hole, which
> apparently
> drops dragon scales randomly. Is this true? Anyone have any
> more details?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Talies
